name: Peggle Style Meter
description: You will need Announcer_dill-1.0.1 for this mod to work. A friend of mine suggested this idea and decided to make it real lol. Look in the [[README.md]] in C:\Users\[[user]]\AppData\Roaming\Thunderstore Mod Manager\DataFolder\ULTRAKILL\profiles\[[profile]]\plugins\PeggleKill for instructions.
